Name: Michael Elfassy
Title: Director of Development, Canada
About:
I'm a software engineer who loves crafting simple solutions to complex problems. I care about finding efficiencies via technology to make everyone's life a little better.

I've worked with a number of large corporations like Notel Networks, CAE Electronics, and numerous startups like passwordbox.com.

Traveling is my biggest passion. I've traveled for work and fun to 20 countries on five continents. I also love skiing, hockey... did I mention I'm from Canada?
